title: 名家吐槽：面向对象编程从骨子里就有问题

<!--StartFragment-->

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">面向对象是<span lang="EN-US">90</span>年代“结构化编程”的万金油，风靡一时，但很难说它就是那些用它开发出来的东西的“终极”编程模式。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;
mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-no-proof:yes"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600"
 o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f"
 stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="图片_x0020_1" o:spid="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:619pt;height:350pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'>
 <v:imagedata src="file:////Users/zhaofeng/Library/Group%20Containers/UBF8T346G9.Office/msoclip1/01/clip_image001.jpg"
  o:title=""/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img width="620" height="350" src="quiver-image-url/33EA0E50166B7EB880B9D935AC1D9E02.jpg" alt="CREATOR: gd-jpeg v1.0 (using IJG JPEG v62), quality = 90
" v:shapes="图片_x0020_1"><!--[endif]--></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;
mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　“面向对象编程是一个极其糟糕的主意，只有硅谷里的人能干出这种事情。”
—<span lang="EN-US"> Edsger Dijkstra(</span>图灵奖获得者<span lang="EN-US">)<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　“面向对象设计是用罗马数字做计算。” —<span lang="EN-US"> Rob Pike(Go</span>语言之父<span lang="EN-US">)<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　“‘面向对象’这个词包含很多意思。有一半是显而易见的，而另一半是错误的。”—<span lang="EN-US"> Paul Graham(</span>美国互联网界如日中天的教父级人物<span lang="EN-US">)<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　“实现上的继承就跟过度使用<span lang="EN-US">goto</span>语句一样，使程序拧巴和脆弱。结果就是，面向对象系统通常遭受复杂和缺乏复用的痛苦。”
—<span lang="EN-US"> John Ousterhout( Tcl and Tk </span>的创始人<span lang="EN-US">)
Scripting, IEEE Computer, March 1998<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　“<span lang="EN-US">90%</span>的这些胡说八道都称现在它很流行，非要往我的代码里搓揉进面向对象的石粒。”
—<span lang="EN-US"> kfx<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　“有时，优雅的实现只需要一个函数。不是一个方法。不是一个类，不是一个框架。只是一个方法。”
—<span lang="EN-US"> John Carmack(id Software</span>的创始人、第一人称射击游戏之父<span lang="EN-US">)<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　“面向对象编程语言的问题在于，它总是附带着所有它需要的隐含环境。你想要一个香蕉，但得到的却是一个大猩猩拿着香蕉，而其还有整个丛林。”
—<span lang="EN-US"> Joe Armstrong(Erlang</span>语言发明人<span lang="EN-US">)<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span style="background:lime;
mso-highlight:lime">“我一度曾经迷恋上了面向对象编程。现在我发现自己更倾向于认为面向对象是一个阴谋，企图毁掉我们的编程乐趣。” —<span lang="EN-US"> Eric Allman(sendmail</span>的创造者<span lang="EN-US">)</span></span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　面向对象是<span lang="EN-US">90</span>年代“结构化编程”的万金油，风靡一时，但很难说它就是那些用它开发出来的东西的“终极”编程模式。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　并且，至少它的这种最流行的形式可能我带来极大的危害，极度的增加复杂性。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span style="color:blue">继承带来的危害远超过好处。这“代码复用”的令人质疑的幌子下，我们的环境中被愚蠢的增添了大量的毫无用处的复杂性，使得必须引入大量的语法上的简写来让这混乱得到最低限度的管理。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　</span><span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://doc.cat-v.org/programming/bad_properties_of_OO"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;
mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#0C3B90;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;text-decoration:none;text-underline:none">Luca Cardelli</span><span lang="ZH-CN" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;
mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#0C3B90;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;text-decoration:none;text-underline:none">：面向对象语言中糟糕的技术特质</span></a></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;
mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　</span><span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://harmful.cat-v.org/software/OO_programming/why_oo_sucks"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;
mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#0C3B90;
